quickActivities.name: Daily Vocabulary Flashcards
quickActivities.description: Create a set of 5 flashcards with new French words or phrases related to your daily theme. Review them aloud.

quickActivities.name: Mirror Practice
quickActivities.description: Stand in front of a mirror and practice introducing yourself in French, focusing on pronunciation and body language.

quickActivities.name: Phrase Repetition
quickActivities.description: Choose a common phrase (e.g., 'Bonjour! Comment ça va?') and repeat it 10 times, gradually increasing your speed.

quickActivities.name: Mini Role-Play
quickActivities.description: Pretend to order a coffee at a café. Use a script or improvise, speaking both roles (you and the waiter).

quickActivities.name: Listening Exercise
quickActivities.description: Listen to a short French audio clip (like a podcast snippet) and summarize what you heard in one sentence.

quickActivities.name: Word Association Game
quickActivities.description: Say a French word and quickly come up with another word that relates to it. For example, 'pain' (bread) could lead to 'beurre' (butter).

quickActivities.name: Picture Description
quickActivities.description: Find a picture of a scene in France. Describe what you see in French, focusing on colors, objects, and actions.

quickActivities.name: Number Practice
quickActivities.description: Practice counting from 1 to 20 in French. Try counting everyday objects around you.

quickActivities.name: Quick Quiz
quickActivities.description: Create a 5-question quiz for yourself using vocabulary from the week. Answer them aloud.

quickActivities.name: Cultural Fact of the Day
quickActivities.description: Look up one interesting fact about French culture or customs and summarize it in French.
